description: Borrowed from Japanese 坐(ざ)禅(ぜん) (zazen), from 坐(ざ) (za, “sitting”) + 禅(ぜん) (zen, “meditation”).

entries.meaning: (Buddhism) A form of seated meditation in Zen Buddhism.
examples: They had sent out scouts to try and locate the original cave where the practice of Zazen was first initiated.
